meanings.definition: To intimidate or dominate with threats or harsh words.
meanings.sent1: The big dog browbeats the smaller dogs in the park.
meanings.sent2: The boss constantly browbeats his employees to work harder.
meanings.sent3: The cat pretends to browbeats the mouse, but they are actually friends.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds browbeats the sun, hiding its light.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's stern look browbeats the students into silence.

meanings.definition: To bully or coerce through aggressive behavior.
meanings.sent1: The older kids browbeats the younger ones on the playground.
meanings.sent2: The politician tries to browbeats his opponents into agreeing with him.
meanings.sent3: The wind seems to browbeats the trees into dancing along.
meanings.sent4: The loud music browbeats the silence of the night.
meanings.sent5: The coach's harsh criticism browbeats the team into improving their performance.
